trigger.name: Erro geral de status do sistema
Muitos erros de status do sistema
Erro de status do sistema de armazenamento

dependency.name: Erro na controladora RAID
dependency.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:RAIDControllerStatus.last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)

item.name: System Power State
item.description: 4 server is on 3 server is on stand-by

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:DiskStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Problema com o disco {#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:FanStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Problema com FAN {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:MemStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Problema com a memória no slot {#SNMPVALUE}

valuemap.name: Dell iDRAC Network Device Connection Status

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:NetStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Erro em NIC {#SNMPINDEX}

item_prototype.name: Fonte de energia {#SNMPINDEX} Tensão de entrada
Fonte de energia {#SNMPINDEX} Estado do Sensor
Fonte de energia {#SNMPINDEX} Configurações de estado

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:PowerSupplySensorState.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>1) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Erro no estado PSU {#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:PowerSupplyStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Problema com PSU {#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>2) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Erro no processador {#SNMPINDEX}

item_prototype.name: Sensor de temperatura {#SNMPVALUE} Limite Baixo Crítico
Sensor de temperatura {#SNMPVALUE} Limite Superior Crítico
Sensor de temperatura {#SNMPVALUE} Limite baixo de aquecimento
Sensor de temperatura {#SNMPVALUE} Limite de aquecimento

trigger_prototype.name: Temperatura em {#SNMPVALUE} criticamente alta
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is above Critical Level.

trigger_prototype.name: Temperatura em {#SNMPVALUE} criticamente baixa
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is below Critical Level.

trigger_prototype.name: Temperatura em {#SNMPVALUE} está alta
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is above Warning Level.

trigger_prototype.name: Temperatura em {#SNMPVALUE} está baixa
trigger_prototype.description: Temperature of the item is below Warning Level.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:VoltageStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Erro no sensor de tensão {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:VolumeDiskState.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>2) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPINDEX} Erro

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:VolumeStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPINDEX} Status Error

trigger.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:VoltageStatusCombined.last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger.name: Erro de status de tensão

trigger.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:GlobalSystemStorageStatus.last(0)}>4) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger.name: Erro de status do sistema de armazenamento

trigger.expression: ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:RAIDControllerStatus.last(0)}<>3) and ({RR Dell iDRAC SNMP:SystemPowerState.last(0)}=4)
trigger.name: Erro na controladora RAID

value_map.name: Dell iDRAC Network Device Connection Status

mapping.newvalue: AC perdido ou fora do alcance
AC fora de alcance, mas ainda presente
